Attenuation: The attenuation profile for how camera shakes' intensity falls off with distance
InnerAttenuationRadius: Under this distance from the source, the camera shakes are at full intensity
OuterAttenuationRadius: Outside of this distance from the source, the camera shakes don't apply at all
CameraShake: The camera shake class to use for this camera shake source actor
bAutoStart: Whether to auto start when created

methods.name: GetAttenuationFactor
methods.doc: Computes an attenuation factor from this source

methods.name: StartCameraShake
methods.doc: Starts a new camera shake originating from this source, and apply it on all player controllers

methods.name: StopAllCameraShakes
methods.doc: Stops all currently active camera shakes that are originating from this source from all player controllers

methods.name: StopAllCameraShakesOfType
methods.doc: Stops a camera shake originating from this source
